titleInfo.title: Report of the engineer of the Second District Swamp Lands, state of Louisiana

originInfo.publisher: New Orleans : Emile La Sere, State Printer, 1854.

mods.note: At head of title: Appendix; Report dated December 20, 1853, and signed: Lafayette Caldwell; addressed to Stephen Van Wickle, Commissioner, Second Swamp Land District; Sometimes also found as an appendix to the Louisiana Senate journal for 1854. Cf. Foote; Last page contains letter to L. Caldwell from John Lobdell of West Baton Rouge Parish, requesting a levee be built at his plantation.

titleInfo.title: LSU Libraries Louisiana Waterways Management Collection

mods.accessCondition: E-mail diglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments. See instructions for ordering reprints of this item here: http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special/services/duplication
